subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: Emirates Team New Zealand closed in on an America’s Cup match against Oracle Team USA, beating Italy’s Luna Rossa to take a 5-1 lead in the Louis Vuitton Cup finals.
snippet: Emirates Team New Zealand closed in on an America’s Cup match against Oracle Team USA, beating Italy’s Luna Rossa to take a 5-1 lead in the Louis Vuitton Cup finals.
